publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-376 Fergus Ewing: Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes—That the Parliament believes that Her Majesty’s Government is under a moral obligation to fund all eligible applications under both the original and the revised Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes following the specific assurances to that effect given by a Minister of Her Majesty’s Government in February 1999. Supported by: Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Michael Russell*
S1M-376 Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes (lodged on 13 December 1999) Irene McGugan*

S1M-376 Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes (lodged on 13 December 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Fergusson*, Alex Johnstone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, David McLetchie*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Aitken*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Nick Johnston*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Keith Harding*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-376 Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes (lodged on 13 December 1999) Nicola Sturgeon*, Fiona Hyslop*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-376 Fergus Ewing: Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes—That the Parliament believes that Her Majesty’s Government is under a moral obligation to fund all eligible applications under both the original and the revised Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes following the specific assurances to that effect given by a Minister of Her Majesty’s Government in February 1999. Supported by: Mr Duncan Hamilton, Michael Russell, Irene McGugan, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Fergusson, Alex Johnstone, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Mary Scanlon, Bill Aitken, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Nick Johnston, Mr David Davidson, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Colin Campbell, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Matheson, Nicola Sturgeon, Fiona Hyslop, Richard Lochhead, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Linda Fabiani
S1M-376 Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes (lodged on 13 December 1999) Andrew Wilson*, Alasdair Morgan*, Alex Neil*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Shona Robison*

S1M-376 Agricultural Business Improvement Schemes (lodged on 13 December 1999) Miss Annabel Goldie*, David Mundell*, Brian Adam*
